AbilityViewAttributes.LocalizedLongDescriptionStringID:
Disables main weapon and redistributes power into anti-air defense systems for 25 seconds.
Cooldown is 65 seconds.
Guards Honorguard cruiser with 4 close range autocannon turrets.

Switches Battlecruiser cannons ammo from AP to HE. Increasing effectiveness at engaging groups of lightly armored targets.
+ Damage per shot 160>110
+ Area of effect radius 60>160
+ Cooldown time between bursts 2 seconds > 0.65 second
- Weapons range 1150m>950m
- Effectiveness vs armor 1 : 1 > 10 : 1(armor is 10x more effective)
- Weapon reload time 3.8 seconds > 3.0 seconds.
